narrative.narrative: Travel Service Hungary was founded in 2001 as a subsidiary of Travel Service which is based in Prague,Czech Republic. TS Hungary is based at Budapest,Hungary. They have two 737-800's. They travel to 14 places in Europe. Five in Greece, four in Spain, the two countries with the most, and 3 in Egypt and 2 in Tunisia, 1 in Morocco. And also Israel and Jordan.
